Summary: BRIGHT ROUND FIREBALLS MOVING SLOWLY FROM EAST TO WEST 5 TO 7 MINUTES APART FROM HORIZON TO HORIZON
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Cookeville
There were no other sightings in Cookeville on or around October 28th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsSTANDING IN THE PARKING LOT OF THE CAR DEALERSHIP THAT I WORK FOR AT ABOUT 9:30 PM A BRIGHT LIGHT IN THE SKY TO THE EAST COMING TOWARDS ME HEADING WEST MY FIRST THOUGHT WAS THAT IT WAS A JUMBO JET ON FIRE COMING IN FOR A CRASH LANDING AS I CONTINUED WATCHING IT DIRECTLY OVERHEAD IT APPEARED TO BE BRIGHTER GLOWING ON THE FRONT SIDE AND DROPPING SMALL FLAMES OR SPARKS STRAIGHT DOWN FROM THE REAR THERE WAS NO TAIL OR FLAMES FROM THE REAR AT ALL WHICH BAFFLED ME BECOUSE I FIGURED IF IT WAS BURNING IN THE ATMOSPHERE IT WOULD HAVE A TAIL OR CONTRAIL THEN I THOUGHT IF THIS THING WAS IN SPACE AND NOT IN OUR ATMOSPHERE ITS GOT TO BE HUGE I WATCHED FOR ABOUT 5 TO 7 MINUTES UNTILL IT WAS OUT OF SITE TALKED TO MY BOSS FOR A FEW MORE MINUTES ABOUT WHAT WE HAD JUST SAW GOT IN MY CAR TO GO HOME AND BEFORE I COULD PULL OFF THE LOT HERE COMES ANOTHER ONE FROM THE SAME DIRECTION HEADING THE SAME DIRECTION I WATCHED IT AS I DROVE TO THE GAS STATION ABOUT 2 BLOCKS FROM WORK GOT A PACK OF CIGGS AND ASK THE GIRL IF SHE SAW THOSE THINGS IN THE SKY AND SHE SAID WHAT THINGS IN THE SKY I POINTED OUT THE WINDOW AS THE BRIGHT LIGHT WAS STILL VISABLE TO THE WEST THE NEXT DAY AT WORK I ASKED EVERYONE IF THEY SAW ANYTHING AND LOOKED IN THE NEWSPAPER FOR ANY REPORTED SIGHTINGS I EVEN CALLED THE SHERRIFFS DEPT AND ASKED IF THERE WERE ANY REPORTS THERE WASNT ANYTHING NOTHING ON THE INTERNET EITHER WENT TO SOME METEOR REPORTING WEB SITE AND FILLED OUT A REPORT TO THEM STARTED RESEARCHING METEORS AND FIREBALLS AND COULD NOT FIND ANY PAST SIGHTINGS THAT LASTED THE DURATION OF MY SIGHTING OR THAT DIDNT HAVE A TAIL
